features.featureTitle: In the public-facing Gallery section (frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx), add an Internet Identity login/logout button positioned inline next to the Gallery section heading. Use the existing useInternetIdentity hook to determine authentication state. When the user is not logged in, render a 'Login' button that triggers the login flow via the hook's login method. When the user is already logged in, render a 'Logout' button that triggers the logout method. Style the button consistently with the site's dark glassmorphism aesthetic: semi-transparent dark background, moon blue (#4fc3f7) border glow, Cinzel or Rajdhani font, with a hover pulse/glow animation. The button must not disrupt the existing gallery heading layout â€” position it as an inline element to the right of the 'Gallery' section title.
